text: Resettle||With no regions currently under your control, you have the option to settle your army here.
Raze||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched. The previous owners will like you a lot less.

Sack||You do not capture the settlement but instead steal wealth and damage buildings. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands.

Loot & Occupy||You gain wealth from looting, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
Raze||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched. The previous owners will like you a lot less.
Restore Numas||Return ownership of Numas to its rightful owner.
